extendedInfo.description: The AR-15 9mm is a magnificent weapon and you can simulate shooting on your cell.You can simulate AR-15 9mm  just shake your phone or just by clicking on the weapon. If you run out of bullets is just click on the charger that charges the AR-15 9mm again. âThe phone vibrates when sound simulation.	âTo fire you just shake your phone or touch the screen.âGreat quality of the sound of gunfire.Note: This application should not be used to harass or bully Other users.

reviews.title: Nothing to it
reviews.comment: The civilian ar15 is not a machine gun or an assault rifle because ar\'s are only semi auto. AR stands for Armalite rifle not assault rifle. While the game play does accurately represent the rifle action the name doesnt. This game isnt very exiting though
reviews.author: Shawn Dunseith

reviews.title: AR-15
reviews.comment: Great for self defense definitely not for hunting just  not meet the qualifications, I\'m sure that the distance the bullet travels it\'s not quite far  enough to bring a game down I have to say that I am a little bit disappointed
reviews.author: Santos Seda

reviews.title: Cheap
